flawed_nl_solution:
The cookies cost 3 x 0.5 = <<3*0.5=1.5>>1.5
The hamburgers cost $7.3 because 2 x 3.65 = <<2*3.65=7.3>>7.3
The total cost is $18 because 7.3 + 2 + 1 + 4 + 1.5 + 0.2 = <<7.3+2+1+4+1.5+0.2=18>>18
The cost is $9 per person because 18 / 2 = <<18/2=9>>9
Toby has $6 in change because 15 - 9 = <<15-9=6>>6
#### 6
